query:
UPDATE trips
SET 
  startDate = startDate + (2 * 365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000),
  endDate = endDate + (2 * 365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
WHERE id = 30001;

SELECT id, name, FROM_UNIXTIME(startDate/1000) as start, FROM_UNIXTIME(endDate/1000) as end
FROM trips WHERE id = 30001;
